item.title: Homing missiles in Godot Engine
item.description: In this tutorial, we will create a homing missile in a 2D top-down shooter.

item.title: Bullet hell in Godot Engine
item.description: In this time, we will create a bullet hell aka barrage for a barrage shooting game.

item.title: Game development starting with something simple
item.description: This article is especially worth reading if you are a beginner who has just started or is thinking about starting game development.

item.title: Four types of guns for top-down shooting in Godot Engine
item.description: In this tutorial, we are going to make four types of guns that commonly appear in 2D top-down shooters.

item.title: Powerful Search Features in Godot Engine
item.description: When we develop a game, especially a big one, sometimes it may often happen that we can never find the scene which we want to edit or we cannot remember where the script file is, which we are going to edit.

item.title: Age Doesn't Matter When You Start Game Development
item.description: Many people want to start game development but tend to give up because of their age.

item.title: Download Godot
item.description: What’s Godot? Godot Engine, or simply Godot, is a very popular open-source game engine that is now gaining popularity, especially in the indie game industry.
